artist: Artist: Georges Braque; Publisher: Éditions Quatre Chemins, Paris; Printer: Daniel Jacomet et Cie, Paris
creditline: Given in loving memory of Salees Smith Seddon 1915-1984, St. Louis, Missouri who gave these volumes in 1954 to Sally Boyd Polk
description: Vol. I: 23 repros. of Braque costume designs; Vol. II: 22 photos of dancers in Les Facheox 1-40 (Hollande van Gelder); 41-425 (Vélin d' Arches); 75 h.c.
image_copyright: ©Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F ADAGP%2C Paris
medium: Color lithographs; b/w illustrations; photographic plates; letterpress
title: Théatre Serge de Diaghilew: Les Facheux (Georges Braque, Jean Cocteau, Louis Laloy, Georges Auric), 2 vols.
